broker.ipc

Interface IProtocolHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProtocolHandler

    public interface IProtocolHandler
    Broker out-sources processing of protocol to implementors of this interface, who determine when to read (and write) When client disconnects, removed from list

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean process(java.io.BufferedReader fromSocket, java.io.PrintWriter toSocket)
      Process the protocol given access to a socket's input and output.
      void setBrokerThread(BrokerThread brokerThread)
      Protocol handler will know its own thread.
      void setID(java.lang.String id)
      ID used by broker to refer to thread.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        boolean process(java.io.BufferedReader fromSocket,
              java.io.PrintWriter toSocket)
        Process the protocol given access to a socket's input and output. Return false to terminate protocol; true to continue

      • setBrokerThread

        void setBrokerThread(BrokerThread brokerThread)
        Protocol handler will know its own thread.

      • setID

        void setID(java.lang.String id)
        ID used by broker to refer to thread.
